description.p: Built with privacy at its core, Ulaa ensures that your data remains protected at every step, offering a browsing experience where security is non-negotiable.
Ulaa offers 5 unique modes—Personal, Work, Kids, Developer, and Open Season—designed to help you cut through the clutter, whether you’re working or unwinding.
Ulaa’s productivity tools including Smart Tab Grouping, Screen Capture, Notes, Zen View, and more make multitasking effortless.
You can also enable Ulaa Sync, powered by Zoho Accounts, to seamlessly take your data wherever you go.
Choose Ulaa and enjoy online privacy like never before.

ul.li: [Desktop][BugFix] Resolved an issue causing the Widevine component download failure.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 141.0.7390.70.
[Desktop] Enhanced Safe Browsing file download handling with a user keep/discard option.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 141.0.7390.54.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 140.0.7339.208.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Revamped enterprise logs.
[Desktop][BugFix] Fixed an RCE vulnerability in Policy Injection by restricting the 'SetLocalTestPolicies' API.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 140.0.7339.185.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 140.0.7339.133.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 140.0.7339.95.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 139.0.7258.158.
[Desktop] Enhanced Safe Browsing for file downloads.
[Desktop][Experiment] Enabled the Enterprise Heartbeat feature flag by default.
[Desktop][Experimental] Introduced Productivity Suite feature in the sidebar.
[Desktop][BugFix] Resolved performance issues with Ulaa Adblocker.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 139.0.7258.143.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 139.0.7258.128.
[Desktop][UI] Active tabs now appear wider than others when many tabs are open and space is limited.
[Desktop][UI] What's New section from Ulaa DevTools has been removed.
[Desktop][BugFix] Resolved the unexpected crash that occurred after prolonged usage.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 139.0.7258.76.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 138.0.7204.184.
[Desktop][UI] Resolved high CPU usage issue on the Downloads page.
[Desktop][UI] Included more size options for page zoom under the Appearance section in Preferences.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Added Extension Telemetry logs to Ulaa Logger.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Added enrollment-related info in the Preferences page.
[Desktop][Bug Fix] Resolved empty policy check for the File Upload Restriction Policy.
[Desktop][Bug Fix] Fixed Auto Mode Switching issue when a tab is restored via "Continue where you left off".
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 138.0.7204.169.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 138.0.7204.158.
[Enterprise] Assigned higher priority to cloud policies over platform policies.
[UI][Adblocker] Fixed URL elision in the Adblocker popup.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 138.0.7204.119.
Updated with the latest security patches and performance enhancements. Chromium engine updated to 138.0.7204.53.
Updated to Chromium Version 137.0.7151.120 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][UI] Implemented an analytical view for Screen Sense.
[Desktop][Enhancement] Disabled Screen Sense in Kids Mode.
[Desktop][Experimental][ZiaLab] Introduced AI/ML experimental feature section in the Preferences page.
[Desktop] Display the current state of a feature flag on `ulaa://flags` when set to Default.
[Desktop][BugFix] Applied throttling only for auto mode switching during main frame navigations.
[Desktop][BugFix] Removed time tracking behaviour in Incognito Mode for Screen Sense.
Updated to Chromium Version 137.0.7151.104 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
Updated to Chromium Version 137.0.7151.72 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Show a dialog when attempting to take screenshots through extensions under ScreenCapture policies.
[Desktop][Enterprise][BugFix] Deprecated the Rawpolicy endpoint in the browser.
Updated to Chromium Version 137.0.7151.56 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][UI] Implemented 'Security' Page in Preferences.
Updated to Chromium Version 136.0.7103.125 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Introduced an enterprise enrollment startup dialog that appears on browser launch.
Updated to Chromium Version 136.0.7103.94.
[Desktop] Added policy to restrict file downloads in managed browsers.
[Desktop] Added policy to restrict printing in managed browsers.
[Desktop] Added policy to apply watermark while printing documents in managed browsers.
[Desktop][Experimental] Initial integration of Ulaa AI Assistant with a toolbar button for quick access.
[Desktop][BugFix] Updated the "Learn more" URL on the 'HTTPS-only mode' blocking page to redirect users to the Advanced security settings support document.
Updated to Chromium Version 136.0.7103.93 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop] Enabled sending crash reports to ZohoDesk from the `ulaa://crashes` internal page.
Updated to Chromium Version 136.0.7103.60 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
Updated to Chromium Version 135.0.7049.114 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][UI] Implemented a "Skip" button in the Welcome Tour for new users, with the option to revisit it via the "ulaa://welcome" URL.
[Desktop][Experimental][Enterprise] Added extension installation events to enterprise logs.
[Desktop][BugFix] Fixed a crash occurring when launching pop-ups.
Updated to Chromium Version 135.0.7049.100 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
Updated to Chromium Version 135.0.7049.85 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
Updated to Chromium Version 135.0.7049.53 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][BugFix] Resolved high CPU usage issue.
Updated to Chromium Version 134.0.6998.178 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop] Enhanced access token fetching for sync.
[Desktop][UI] Added a sync indicator to the profile avatar icon.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Added a browser report to the heartbeat.
Updated to Chromium Version 134.0.6998.118 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][Feature] Implemented a new design flow for the Welcome Tour for newly installed users.
Updated to Chromium Version 134.0.6998.89 with the latest security patches.
[Desktop][Experimental][Enterprise] Added policy to manage Ulaa logging system.
[Desktop][Experimental][Enterprise] Enhanced Ulaa logger by incorporating more detailed log fields for improved readability and analysis.
[Desktop][Enterprise] Added URL-based ScreenCapture policy to block screenshots through extensions.
Updated to Chromium Version 134.0.6998.45 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
Updated to Chromium Version 133.0.6943.142 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
Updated to Chromium Version 133.0.6943.127 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.

[Desktop] Added an option to enable/disable tabs search button.
Updated to Chromium Version 133.0.6943.54 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
[Desktop][UI] Updated copyright year to 2025.
[Desktop][BugFix] Fixed the arbitrary crash for signed-in users when closing a mode.
Updated to Chromium Version 132.0.6834.163 with the latest security patches and performance improvements.
